revision.text:
{{codepointer|Status change|r=Hexen}} '''A_SerpentHide'''
(no parameters) Makes the calling actor invisible and sets the actor's [[Floorclip|floorclip]] property to 0. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Serpent}} and derived classes. == See also == *[[A_SerpentUnHide]] *[[A_HideThing]] *[[A_UnHideThing]]
